name: Skull Tower Defense Games
description:
Skulls are coming! And you are the only hero in the realm. Take your bow and arrows, aim from a tower and shoot your enemies to stop every wave! The future of your realm depends on you. Fight the creeps and protect the castle stronghold in epic strategy battles full of fantasy and action.

As a legendary archer, your have sworn to protect your kingdom and the people. Now, your mission is to combat a new danger: hordes of skulls want to invade the empire! Enjoy fantasy tower defense games full of action and strategy. Use your first person archery skills and shoot every enemy.

Skull Towers mix tower defense (TD), role playing games (RPG) and strategy elements. Check out these features:

-Fantasy missions with creeps waves.
-Build your stronghold and weapons to defend the empire.
-First Person archery skills. Shoot from a castle.
-Defend your realm from the skulls siege.
-Become one of the bravest warriors.
-Grow your defenses: towers, catapults, cannons…
-Play for free and offline. No internet connection required.
-Strategy mechanics: create your own defense and protect the base.

Download Skull Towers and start playing offline. Enjoy one of the best tower defense games and protect people from the creeps!
